articles.description: The X Factor hopeful – real name Amy Burdett – was found with a "stab wound to her neck" at her home in Leeds on 12 November last year as an inquest revealed more about her tragic death
articles.content:
Former X Factor contestant Ariel Burdett tragically took her own life and wasn't found until days later, an inquest into her death has heard.
The 38-year-old was one of the ITV show's most remembere… [+2109 chars]

articles.author: Liam Hess
articles.title: Pat McGrath Is the First Makeup Artist to Be Named a Dame - Vogue
articles.description: The legendary beauty mogul became the first makeup artist ever to be named a Dame of the British Empire by the Queen yesterday.
articles.content: Yesterday, the Queens annual list of New Years Honors was released, naming the figures across British society and culture who would receive the crowns highest accolades for their services to the coun… [+3099 chars]

articles.author: Charlotte Runcie
articles.title: True public interest broadcaster Jane Garvey made her Woman’s Hour exit all about the listeners - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: The presenter signed off 13 years with emotional accounts of 2020, plus a confrontation with Penelope Cruz and a dance lesson
articles.content: Then there was a brief reel of Garvey's best bits, mixed to the strains of Sinatras My Way. It included a surreal confrontation with Penelope Cruz about whether Spanish people get up later in the day… [+1718 chars]
